ArticleTitle.sentence: Regulation of the megakaryocytic glycoprotein IX promoter by the oncogenic Ets transcription factor Fli-1.

event.clue: Regulation of the megakaryocytic glycoprotein IX promoter by the oncogenic Ets transcription factor Fli-1.

AbstractText.sentence: Glycoprotein (GP) IX is a subunit of the von Willebrand receptor, GPIb-V-IX, which mediates adhesion of platelets to the subendothelium of damaged blood vessels.

event.clue: Glycoprotein (GP) IX is a subunit of the von Willebrand receptor, GPIb-V-IX, which mediates adhesion of platelets to the subendothelium of damaged blood vessels.
Glycoprotein (GP) IX is a subunit of the von Willebrand receptor, GPIb-V-IX, which mediates adhesion of platelets to the subendothelium of damaged blood vessels.

AbstractText.sentence: Previous characterization of the GPIX promoter identified a functional Ets site that, when disrupted, reduced promoter activity.

event.clue: Previous characterization of the GPIX promoter identified a functional Ets site that, when disrupted, reduced promoter activity.
Previous characterization of the GPIX promoter identified a functional Ets site that, when disrupted, reduced promoter activity.

AbstractText.sentence: However, the Ets protein(s) that regulated GPIX promoter expression was unknown.

event.clue: However, the Ets protein(s) that regulated GPIX promoter expression was unknown.
However, the Ets protein(s) that regulated GPIX promoter expression was unknown.

AbstractText.sentence: In this study, transient cotransfection of several GPIX promoter/reporter constructs into 293T kidney fibroblasts with a Fli-1 expression vector shows that the oncogenic protein Fli-1 can transactivate the GPIX promoter when an intact GPIX Ets site is present.

event.clue: In this study, transient cotransfection of several GPIX promoter/reporter constructs into 293T kidney fibroblasts with a Fli-1 expression vector shows that the oncogenic protein Fli-1 can transactivate the GPIX promoter when an intact GPIX Ets site is present.

AbstractText.sentence: In addition, Fli-1 binding of the GPIX Ets site was identified in antibody supershift experiments in nuclear extracts derived from hematopoietic human erythroleukemia cells.

event.clue: In addition, Fli-1 binding of the GPIX Ets site was identified in antibody supershift experiments in nuclear extracts derived from hematopoietic human erythroleukemia cells.

AbstractText.sentence: Comparative studies showed that Fli-1 was also able to transactivate the GPIbalpha and, to a lesser extent, the GPIIb promoter.

event.clue: Comparative studies showed that Fli-1 was also able to transactivate the GPIbalpha and, to a lesser extent, the GPIIb promoter.
Comparative studies showed that Fli-1 was also able to transactivate the GPIbalpha and, to a lesser extent, the GPIIb promoter.

AbstractText.sentence: Immunoblot analysis identified Fli-1 protein in lysates derived from platelets.

event.clue: Immunoblot analysis identified Fli-1 protein in lysates derived from platelets.

AbstractText.sentence: In addition, expression of Fli-1 was identified immunohistochemically in megakaryocytes derived from CD34(+) cells treated with the megakaryocyte differentiation and proliferation factor, thrombopoietin.

event.clue: In addition, expression of Fli-1 was identified immunohistochemically in megakaryocytes derived from CD34(+) cells treated with the megakaryocyte differentiation and proliferation factor, thrombopoietin.

AbstractText.sentence: These results suggest that Fli-1 is likely to regulate lineage-specific genes during megakaryocytopoiesis.

event.clue: These results suggest that Fli-1 is likely to regulate lineage-specific genes during megakaryocytopoiesis.
